bioconda.name: squirrel
bioconda.summary: Some QUIck Reconstruction to Resolve Evolutionary Links.

biotools.summary:
Some QUIck Reconstruction to Resolve Evolutionary Links

Squirrel provides a rapid way of producing reliable alignments for MPXV and also enable maximum-likelihood phylogenetics pipeline tree estimation.

galaxy.summary: QC and Phylogenetic analysis of MPXV
